name: Steamless
description:
Made for #githubgameoffs theme cliche, my cliche was running out of steam

The idea was an old steampunk world that is slowley running out of water and thus steam.

As with most gamejams i bit of more than i can chew, But this is a very short entry for what i tried to do

Made in godot

Movement is wasd, the rest should be shown on screen when needed

Project is very unfinishedm and has a lot of issues with scalingm textures and what not. still hope you can enjoy
